field.name: name_title
field.param1: Dr. Mr. Ms. Prof. other その他 ...

field.description: 下の名前（ローマ字）Given name (en)

field.name: name_surname_en
field.description: 上の名前（ローマ字） Surname (en)

field.name: affiliation_state
field.description: 都道府県 State or Prefecture

field.name: email
field.description: Ｅメールアドレス Email address

field.name: membership_fees
field.param1:
個人年会費 Individual membership (¥10,000 yen)
個人年会費：団体に所属 Individual from MAJ Institution (¥0 yen)
個人年会費：スポンサーに所属 Individual from MAJ Sponsor (¥0 yen)
団体年会費 MAJ Institution membership (¥50,000 yen)
非会員 Non-member (¥0 yen)

field.name: conference_fees
field.param1:
会員大会参加費 MAJ member conference fee (¥0 yen)
非会員大会参加費 Non-member conference fee (¥10,000 yen)
非会員大会参加費：学生 Non-member conference fee: student (¥3,000 yen)
非会員大会参加費：割引該当者 Non-member conference fee: concession (¥3,000 yen)
非会員大会参加費：学校教員（幼小中高） Non-member conference fee: school teacher (¥5,000 yen)
非会員大会参加費：スポンサー招待者 Non-member conference fee: Sponsor guest (¥0 yen)
非会員大会参加費：ＭＡＪ招待者 Non-member conference fee: MAJ guest (¥0 yen)
大会に不参加 Do NOT attend the Conference (¥0 yen)

field.name: dinner_attend
field.description: 懇親会の出欠 Attend dinner?
field.param1:
懇親会に出席 Attend the Moot dinner (¥4,500 yen)
懇親会に出席：ＭＡＪ招待者 Attend the Moot dinner: MAJ guest (¥0 yen)
懇親会に出席：スポンサー招待者 Attend the Moot dinner: Sponsor guest (¥0 yen)
懇親会に欠席 Do NOT attend the Moot dinner (¥0 yen)

field.description: 懇親会の食事 Dinner food
field.param1: 食事の特別要望なし Any food is OK

field.param1: ペイパルで払う pay via PayPal 銀行振込で払う pay via Bank transfer

field.name: confirm_add_record
field.description: 新規登録確認 Confirm ADD record
field.param1: confirm
field.param4: Dear [[firstname]] [[lastname]], this email confirms that you have added registration details for [[conference_name_en]]. The submission details appear below. You can review and update this information online on the following URL: [[recordurl]] best regards [[conference_name_en]] committee ====================================== Registration details: ====================================== [[registration_details]]

field.name: confirm_update_record
field.description: 登録更新確認 Confirm UPDATE record
field.param1: confirm
field.param4: Dear [[firstname]] [[lastname]], this email confirms that you have updated your registration details for [[conference_name_en]]. The revised registration details appear below. You can review and update this information online on the following URL: [[recordurl]] best regards [[conference_name_en]] committee ====================================== Registration details: ====================================== [[registration_details]]

field.name: fee_amount
field.param1: [[IF membership_fees CONTAINS "Non-member"]] [[IF conference_fees CONTAINS "Do NOT attend the Conference"]] [[ELIF conference_fees CONTAINS "Non-member conference fee ("]] ¥10,000 yen [[ELIF conference_fees CONTAINS "Non-member conference fee: student ("]] ¥3,000 yen [[ELIF conference_fees CONTAINS "Non-member conference fee: concession ("]] ¥3,000 yen [[ELIF conference_fees CONTAINS "Non-member conference fee: school teacher ("]] ¥5,000 yen [[ENDIF]] [[ELIF membership_fees CONTAINS "Individual membership"]] ¥10,000 yen [[ELIF membership_fees CONTAINS "MAJ Institution membership"]] ¥50,000 yen [[ELIF membership_fees CONTAINS "MAJ Associate membership"]] ¥50,000 yen [[ENDIF]]

field.name: fee_type_en
field.param1:
[[IF membership_fees CONTAIN "Non-member"]] Conference
Fees Receipt [[ELSE]] Membership
Fees Receipt [[ENDIF]]

field.name: fee_type_ja
field.param1:
[[IF membership_fees CONTAIN "Non-member"]] 大会参加費
領収書 [[ELSE]] 年会費
領収書 [[ENDIF]]

field.name: fee_description_en
field.param1:
[[IF membership_fees CONTAINS "Non-member"]] for attending [[conference_name_en]],
held [[conference_dates_en]],
at [[conference_venue_en]]. [[ELSE]] for annual membership of the Moodle Association of Japan [[ENDIF]]

field.name: fee_description_ja
field.param1:
[[IF membership_fees CONTAINS "Non-member"]] [[conference_dates_ja]]に [[conference_venue_ja]]で開催された
[[conference_name_ja]]大会の参加費 [[ELSE]] 日本ムードル協会の年会費 [[ENDIF]]
